sent_1: Haitians Turn to Faith for Support
sent_2: Some Haitians trying to rebuild their shattered communities are turning to their faith.

sent_1: Some Haitians trying to rebuild their shattered communities are turning to their faith.
sent_2: VOA's Mike O'Sullivan reports from Port-au-Prince that many Haitians now worship in the open air after their churches were badly damaged or destroyed by a devastating earthquake nearly three weeks ago.
